anya-e0102n3:3_0: Attha lakkhaṇa tāvatva, kama saṅkhepa vitthārā;
anya-e0102n3:6_4: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti,
anya-e0102n3:6_6: Te ca āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti,
anya-e0102n3:6_8: idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati,
anya-e0102n3:6_13: āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:7_1: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:7_2: Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ āyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0102n3:7_4: Sāsane pana “manoramme āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:7_6: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:8_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:8_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro.
anya-e0102n3:8_12: kāraṇaṭṭhenacāti imehipi kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:9_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n3:9_1: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:10_1: Tāni ca pana tesaṁ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:11_3: evaṁ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanānīti vuttānīti ce.
anya-e0102n3:11_5: ca vavatthānato ayametesaṁ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni,
anya-e0102n3:11_11: Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti evamettha tāvatvato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:12_0: 514.Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n3:12_1: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:12_3: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni,
anya-e0102n3:12_6: cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ pana gocarattā tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
anya-e0102n3:12_8: Vuttañhetaṁ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n3:12_9: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n3:13_0: 515.Saṅkhepavitthārāti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena tadavasesānañca
anya-e0102n3:13_1: āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
anya-e0102n3:13_2: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
anya-e0102n3:14_0: 516.Daṭṭhabbatoti ettha pana sabbāneva saṅkhatāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:14_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
anya-e0102n3:14_8: Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṁ evaṁ hoti “aho vata amhākaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā”ti,
anya-e0102n3:14_9: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti,
anya-e0102n3:14_21: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0102n3:20_2: Cakkhussa viññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇanti evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṁ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:20_6: Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṁ,
anya-e0102n3:20_13: Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi saṁsāradukkhaṁ sattehi anuvidhīyati.
anya-e0102n3:20_16: Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṁ vidahati,
anya-e0102n3:21_1: Apica yathā titthiyānaṁ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi,
anya-e0102n3:21_3: etā pana attano sabhāvaṁ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0102n3:21_4: Yathā loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā dhātuyoti vuccanti,
anya-e0102n3:21_7: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu dhātusamaññā,
anya-e0102n3:21_8: evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n3:21_11: Tathā hi bhagavā “cha dhāturo ayaṁ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṁ dhātudesanaṁ akāsīti.
anya-e0102n3:22_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ dhātu ca cakkhudhātu…pe…
anya-e0102n3:23_1: Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:24_0: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n3:25_34: “anekadhātu nānādhātu loko”ti evamādayo aññāpi dhātuyo dissanti.
anya-e0102n3:25_35: Evaṁ sati sabbāsaṁ vasena paricchedaṁ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce.
anya-e0102n3:26_5: Kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā.
anya-e0102n3:27_4: “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṁ pariyantaṁ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṁ etasmiṁ antare
anya-e0102n3:27_5: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:28_1: “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vacanato manoviññāṇadhātupi hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n3:29_4: lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:31_3: Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṁ sabbadhātūnaṁ tadantogadhattā aṭṭhāraseva vuttāti.
anya-e0102n3:32_1: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṁ saññāsamūhananatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
anya-e0102n3:32_2: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino,
anya-e0102n3:32_4: aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṁ jīvasaññaṁ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā.
anya-e0102n3:32_6: Ye ca imāya anatisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyasattā,
anya-e0102n3:38_0: 522.Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
anya-e0102n3:38_2: phoṭṭhabbadhātu pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_3: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena dve dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0102n3:38_5: Manodhātu pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_6: Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṁ arūpakkhandhānaṁ soḷasannaṁ sukhumarūpānaṁ asaṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:38_7: Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n3:39_2: rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṁ vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:39_4: Pañcannaṁ pana nesaṁ āvajjanamanodhātu anantarasamanantaranatthivigatānantarūpanissayavasena pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n3:39_9: Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:40_1: Āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātu ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:40_2: Dhammadhātu pana sattannampi viññāṇadhātūnaṁ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatādīhi bahudhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n3:40_3: Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayādīhipi paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n3:40_4: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnañca na kevalaṁ cakkhurūpādayo paccayā honti,
anya-e0102n3:42_1: Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:43_1: Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo pubbantāparantavivittato dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasuññato paccayāyattavuttito ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:44_0: Visesato panettha bheritalaṁ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0102n3:45_0: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṁ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:46_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n3:46_2: puthujjanānaṁ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi viya.
anya-e0102n3:46_4: Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṁ pakkhipanato aṅgārakāsuyaṁ khipanakapurisā viya.
anya-e0102n3:46_8: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā?
